name: Button
description: A customizable button component with various variants and states

props.variant: The style of the button: 'primary', 'secondary', 'outline', or 'ghost'
props.size: The size of the button: 'sm', 'md', or 'lg'
props.isLoading: Whether the button is in a loading state
props.onClick: Function called when the button is clicked
props.className: Additional CSS classes to apply to the button
